name: NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, petitioner, v. GESTAMP SOUTH CAROLINA LLC.
name_abbreviation: Nat'l Labor Relations Bd. v. Gestamp S.C. LLC.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, petitioner,
v.
GESTAMP SOUTH CAROLINA LLC.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit for further consideration in light of NLRB v. Noel Canning, 573 U.S. ----, 134 S.Ct. 2550, --- L.Ed.2d ---- (2014).
casebody.head_matter:
NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, petitioner,
v.
GESTAMP SOUTH CAROLINA LLC.
No. 13-1103.
Supreme Court of the United States
July 1, 2014.
Case below, 547 Fed.Appx. 164.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit for further consideration in light of NLRB v. Noel Canning, 573 U.S. ----, 134 S.Ct. 2550, --- L.Ed.2d ---- (2014).
